statements: SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions;
SELECT hardware_name, quantum_model FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT prediction_result FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE hardware_name = 'IBM QX5';
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions ORDER BY hardware_name DESC;
SELECT prediction_result, quantum_model FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE hardware_name = 'IBM Quantum System One';
SELECT id, prediction_result FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE quantum_model = 'Qiskit';
SELECT hardware_name, historical_data->>'date' as last_updated FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT AVG(length(prediction_result->>'accuracy')) as avg_accuracy FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE prediction_result->>'success' = 'true' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, data_time, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_performance ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT hardware_id, MAX(prediction_score) AS max_score FROM quantum_hardware_performance;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, data_time, data_value FROM historical_data ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_time ASC
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data
SELECT hardware_id, performance_metric, prediction_score FROM quantum_hardware_performance WHERE prediction_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data UNION ALL SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_performance
SELECT * FROM hardware_performance;
SELECT model_name, performance_score FROM hardware_performance WHERE date_measured > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hardware_id, MAX(measurement_value) AS max_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY hardware_id;
SELECT trend_description, hardware_model, predicted_performance FROM future_trends ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance FROM hardware_performance;
SELECT * FROM hardware_performance WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT model_name, performance_score FROM hardware_performance WHERE date_measured > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hardware_id, performance_metric, measurement_value FROM historical_data WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT trend_description, predicted_performance FROM future_trends WHERE prediction_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hardware_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, data, date FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT prediction, accuracy FROM prediction_data WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT hardware_name, manufacturer, performance FROM quantum_hardware ORDER BY performance ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM future_trends WHERE predicted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, data FROM historical_data WHERE id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware WHERE performance > 0.8 ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_description FROM future_trends WHERE predicted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT prediction, accuracy FROM prediction_data WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_data;
SELECT hardware_name, manufacturing_date, performance_score FROM quantum_hardware_data;
SELECT hardware_name, performance_score FROM quantum_hardware_data WHERE hardware_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_score FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_score > 80;
SELECT hardware_name, manufacturing_date FROM quantum_hardware_data WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_score FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT hardware_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM quantum_hardware_data JOIN performance_metrics ON quantum_hardware_data.hardware_id = performance_metrics.hardware_id WHERE metric_value < 0.5;

SELECT prediction_date, predicted_performance FROM future_predictions JOIN trends_analysis ON future_predictions.trend_id = trends_analysis.trend_id WHERE trend_description LIKE '%quantum%' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
